description: Childhood friend of Curio and the more refined of the duo. A ladies` man and expert archer, he also takes part in underground sabotage and intelligence. Out of all of Juliet`s comrades, he is the one who openly vouches for Romeo`s love for Juliet. Though in episode 18 it is implied that he is in love with Juliet At the end of the series, he becomes a member of Neo Verona`s new parliament.
name: Francisco
